subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
lead_paragraph: Mike Connolly scored a short-handed goal and had three assists as Minnesota-Duluth beat top-seeded Yale, 5-3, in Bridgeport, Conn., to earn a trip to the Frozen Four.
snippet: Mike Connolly scored a short-handed goal and had three assists as Minnesota-Duluth beat top-seeded Yale, 5-3, in Bridgeport, Conn., to earn a trip to the Frozen Four.
